name: Miracle Magnets - PS edition
description:
I created this game with @tijit for Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 2. It's a block-pushing puzzle game, but the blocks are magnets.

This puzzlescript version allowed us to test out the mechanics ... and then we made a much prettier downloadable version too. It has smoother animations, level skip options, and some nice shader effects (if your computer supports them).
